main.value:
This setting was created to increase the reusability of each CTA, while preventing it from being (un)intentionally added in the wrong places.

By selecting a given checkbox, the CTA will show up as an option somewhere in the configuration of that area (Header, Content, Sidebar or Footer).

{
    "caption": "Availability",
    "name": "cta_availability",
    "description": "Where would you like to be able to place this CTA?",
    "type": "checkbox",
    "category": "CTA - Settings",
    "sortOrder": "1",
    "inputOptionValues": "In page header==header||In sidebar (on detail pages)==sidebar||In the content (through CB)==content||Below the content==footer",
    "templates": [
        "GlobalCTA"
    ]
}
Generates a list of available CTAs inside the header and allows you to select one.

{
    "caption": "Call to action (CTA)",
    "name": "header_cta",
    "description": "Select a CTA for display in header. CTAs can be created under Global Content. This will replace the Title values, but Background settings still apply. Please note that possibly inherited CTAs might not be visible on page because of Inheritance setting.",
    "type": "listbox",
    "category": "Header",
    "sortOrder": "20",
    "defaultValue": "@INHERIT",
    "inputOptionValues": "@CHUNK tvSelectCTA",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_all"
    ]
}
